definitions: A thing that holds something in place.
An appliance for keeping a loose tooth, an orthodontic prosthesis, or orthodontically aligned teeth in place.
A fee paid in advance to someone, especially a barrister, in order to secure their services for use when required.
A reduced rent paid to retain accommodation during a period of non-occupancy.
A servant, especially one who has worked for a person or family for a long time.
